thread.section_title: McElhinneys Department Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of McElhinneys Department Store | mcelhinneys.com
thread.title: Kitty
thread.title_full: McElhinneys Department Store reviewed by Kitty

author: Kitty
title: Kitty
text: Buying online can be so hit and miss but with McElhinneys the store people at the other end of the phone are so knowledgeable about the stock in store. Buying online has been made so easy and I found the most beautiful dress for our family wedding. I think I've found a friend for life here and will def shop again here - highly recommend.
